g4p.tool.gui.propertygrid

Class Validator

  • java.lang.Object
    • g4p.tool.gui.propertygrid.Validator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TDataConstants, java.io.Serializable

    public abstract class Validator
extends java.lang.Object
implements TDataConstants, java.io.Serializable
    A collection of classes to provide validators to control input into the property grid.
    Author:
    Peter Lager
